thread.title: Germany: Will discuss all options regarding planned U.S. tariffs at EU summit

title: Germany: Will discuss all options regarding planned U.S. tariffs at EU summit
text: March 21, 2018 / 10:59 AM / Updated 42 minutes ago Germany: Will discuss all options regarding planned U.S. tariffs at EU summit Reuters Staff 1 Min Read BERLIN (Reuters) - All options to respond to planned U.S. tariffs on aluminium and steel will be discussed at a summit of EU leaders this week, a German government official said on Wednesday. A worker of German steel manufacturer Salzgitter AG stands in front of a furnace at a plant in Salzgitter, Germany, March 1, 2018. REUTERS/Fabian Bimmer The official expressed confidence that the European Union would take a coherent stance on the issue and said there was willingness to talk to the United States about reducing tariffs and other restrictions to trade. Reporting by Andreas Rinke; Writing by Michelle Martin; Editing by Tom Sims
